GOLDBERGER: Thirty years of doing this 4 and I have never had an argument over this. 5 MR. TEIN: You've made -- Ted, you are 6 obstructionist, you are a liar. You have lied and 7 misrepresented things, for the record. You are 8 grandstanding. 9 MR. LEOPOLD: You need to back up. 10 MR. TEIN: No, no. I'm going to finish. 11 MR. That was a lie. I have never seen a 24 lawyer deign to do something like that. 25 So you will get the ex -- be quiet.
